entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, St. Leonard
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Friday: Light snow. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Light snow ending this morning then clearing. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 18 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 31 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 24 February 2023
